[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://sites.ipagepro.com/nm-private-car-service-inc/wp-content/uploads/sites/17/2022/04/NMPrivateCar-BNimage2.jpg” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”28px” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”15px||12px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FLAT RATE PRIVATE CAR SERVICE TO AND FROM CHICAGO DOWNTOWN, SUBURBS & AIRPORTS NEEDS!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#A70000″ header_3_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Chicago IL Black Car Service

Whether you need airport pickup and drop off service, a wedding limo, or a party bus for your bachelorette party, call 331-642-8498 today!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”airport” _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f5f5f5″ hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items:center;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#A70000″ header_3_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Airport Transportation

Airport TransportationIf you need O’Hare or Midway Airport pickup or drop off services, depend on NM Private Car Service Inc. for professional, prompt and courteous service every time. Our licensed chauffeurs will arrive on time to safely transport you to your destination. Save the time and hassle of arranging for airport transportation. Call our professionals for worry-free car service throughout Chicago!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://sites.ipagepro.com/nm-private-car-service-inc/wp-content/uploads/sites/17/2022/04/AirportTransfer.jpg” title_text=”AirportTransfer” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” module_id=”car” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#A70000″ header_3_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hourly Charter Service

At NM Private Car Service Inc., we are proud to provide dependable car service throughout Chicago, IL. We are available seven days a week for your ultimate convenience.

Rates

  • Sedan Rate $187.50 for the first 2 hours (Minimum Requirement) and then $75.00/hr for each additional hour billed in 15 minute increments, gratuity is included in rate.
  • SUV Rate $235.00 for the first 2 hours (Minimum Requirement) and then $93.75/hr for each additional hour billed in 15 minute increments, gratuity is included in rate.
  • Stretch Limo, Sprinter Van, and Passenger Bus Rates, Please call/email for pricing.

Whether you need a ride to downtown or the suburbs, reserve your car service today!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f5f5f5″ hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” module_id=”event” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items:center;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#A70000″ header_3_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Event Transportation

Do you need transportation to and from a special event? We offer event transportation for all types of special occasions including weddings, girls’ and guys’ night outings, anniversaries, birthdays, proms, sporting events, casino trips, corporate events and more. Our large fleet of vehicles includes:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#A70000″ header_3_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Sedans
  • SUVs
  • Stretch Limos
  • Party Buses

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://sites.ipagepro.com/nm-private-car-service-inc/wp-content/uploads/sites/17/2022/04/limo-party.jpg” title_text=”limo-party” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Reservation Policy

All reservations are subject to guaranteed payment. The credit card number taken at the time of your order is used for this purpose. Charges for your reservation will be billed to this credit card if you do not cancel you service as per our cancellation policy shown below.

Surcharges That May Apply

  • Late Night/Early Morning Surcharge (Service starting between 11:45 PM and 4:30 AM), additional $10.
  • Baby/infant car seat, additional $20.
  • Booster seats (1st booster free, add $15 each thereafter)
  • Extra stop off along the way, additional $15. (15 minutes max)
  • Meet and Greet at the Airport/Train Station, additional $20.

Wait Time

Wait Time Outside of the Airport:

You will be allowed a 15-minute grace period from the time of your scheduled pickup; you will then be charged $1.00 a minute thereafter until you depart.

Wait Time Inside of the Airport:

Domestic Flights will be allowed a 45 minute grace period starting from the time your plane has gated, you will then be charged $1.00 a minute thereafter until you depart. International Flights will be allowed a 75 minute grace period starting from the time your plane has gated, you will then be charged $1.00 a minute thereafter until you depart./p>

Cancellation Policy

We will require at least a 2-hour notice to change or cancel your reservation for airport transportation via sedan, SUV, or limousine. If you cancel less than two hours before your scheduled pickup time, we will charge a 100% cancellation fee. This does not apply to flight cancellations due to weather or events beyond your control.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#2f2f2f” custom_padding=”32px||25px||false|false” global_module=”720″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_font=”||||on||||” link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” ul_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#A70000″]

Contact NM Private Car Service Inc. in Chicago IL today!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
